beer.name: Otter's Dubbel
beer.description: Otter Creek Brewing's 13th "stop" on the World Tour is available starting in October. "Otter's Dubbel" is a Belgian-style Dubbel. True to style, it is rich and malty with a hint of caramel. The caramel comes from the use of a traditional ingredient in Belgian ales- dark candy sugar.
